file_content.text: Just a few adjustments....
I'm really sorry about that, my lord. Those results were unexpected.
The Sand People attacked me, not the wildlife.
It didn't work.
I owe you thanks. I wasn't getting anywhere with that stupid junk salesman cover.
That thing nearly killed me!
Please, no. I'm just doing my job.
Take anything you want. From the good stuff. Anything. Just don't kill me!
I've taken worse jobs.
If it's any consolation, this test should allow me to put the finishing touches on the device.
Take anything you want for your troubles. The good stuff, not that junk. Got some blasters, some armor. Maybe even a lightsaber piece or two.
Thank you for agreeing to this. It's a big favor.
Oh, Geris Paelid, inventor, artist and general mischief-maker, at your service. You look like a man of taste.
Geris Paelid, inventor, artist and general mischief-maker, at your service. You look like a woman of taste.
Perhaps you're interested in my sonic earwax removal system? Or this shiny globe. It will stay with you wherever you go.
I don't understand the purpose of a globe that follows me around.
What's the globe do?
Why don't you buy one and tell me?
Leave me alone.
All right, all right. Look. I'm not really a junk salesman. It's just my cover.
I've been looking all over Tatooine for an earwax remover and shiny globe salesman.
I'll take both.
They're yours! You're the first person to show any interest in this junk.
Look, just between you and me, I'm not really a junk salesman. It's just a cover.
I'm from Imperial Intelligence's Experimental Weapons Division. Supposed to trick hapless fools into testing a new weapon. But you're neither hapless nor a fool.
I'm from Imperial Intelligence's Experimental Weapons Division. Supposed to trick hapless fools into testing a new weapon. But you're not hapless fools.
Untested weapons are the best kind. Such unexpected results.
Now I'm intrigued.
My lord, I see you are not only a connoisseur of fine things, but you have a curious mind like mine.
I need to maintain my cover, but I'm always willing to support a fellow agent.
How can I help?
Don't worry. Neither of us needs to blow our covers for this one.
I'm Sith. I am the Empire's greatest weapon.
Your weapons can't compare.
I won't deny that. But the rest of us could use some help. That's what my division's for.
What's life without a little risk, right?
I'm game.
Death is inevitable, my friend. All we can do is make it a good one.
What kind of weapon is it?
You're right.
But I haven't even told you what it does! It's a marvel. You won't regret it.
This is the Sand People deployment device, designed to send a signal that stirs up Sand People against the enemies of the Empire.
I need someone to plant this device over at these farmland coordinates. It's the perfect test site. Abandoned, but covered in wildlife for the Sand People to attack.
This could be dangerous.
It can't hurt, can it?
The device should have a range of two kilometers. There are Sand People settlements all over this area, so it should be plenty.
That's what I'm trying to find out.
I think not. [Refuse quest]
I'm not getting any other takers. I hope you change your mind.
Busy, busy, busy. Got to keep busy.
